channel.title: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info
channel.description:
hey, im intrested in making a 24/7 server all we would need is VPS hosting.
22$ a month
each pay 11$ each month and we host the server off it it will host for 24/7
:P
if your intrested please post or pm me or you know msn - danieltero@hotmail.com

item.title: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

PAH noobs, i pay £4.95 a month for a debian-ubuntu VPS that is entirly command line. And it’ll hold 300 - 400 people XP

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info

item.title: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

The $25 one I use has 512mb guaranteed ram, 5gb space, no bandwidth limit, and the problem with all of this is VPS’s are glitchy as f*ck with Java servers. (Especially Linux, Window’s isn’t as bad, but still pretty glitchy.)

Also, I’d encourage you not to let them setup or try to setup your private server because it’s probably against their ToS.

Once its setup, I’ll give you a tutorial on getting your server running if you’d like…just pm me later.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info

item.title: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info
item.dc:creator: @IRISH-PRIDE IRISH-PRIDE
item.description:
@IRISH-PRIDE wrote:

lol i kno

but my hoster will set it all up for me if we get everything in order so its cool.

aka www.trutechosting.com - 22$ a month

this is the email they send me when i asked about it :

VPS on 1 dedicated server but you need the right software to do it.
As you have seen on trutechosting.com I sell VPS. It is better/faster than shared hosting which is what you have right now. If you ever wanted to have your own VPS I could get you one setup for you for $22.95/mo and it would have 256MB guaranteed RAM, 500 Burst RAM, 14 GB Dedicated disk space, Unmetered bandwidth. You could re-install an operating system in just seconds. You and your friend could share the costs of the VPS in half and it wouldn’t that expensive $11.50/mo each.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info

item.title: Anyone wanna partner up and make 247 serveer ? read for info
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

lol, I pay $25 a month for a VPS, alone. Good luck setting it up. I don’t think many people on here have the mental ability to set it up, no offense…But seriously, it can be a pain to setup at times. EDIT: Oh, I’m talking about Linux VPS btw.

And the 11$ i might be able 2 do it but if i cant ill do most of the coding =p.

I already have a source coded a doidan server that will hold 60-100 ppl without lag so with a vps prolly hold 110-140.

Message me soon haha =p or email at monkey2176@aol.com!~
